General.Name: Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells forging hydraulic and mechanical press equipment in China. The company also offers metallic forming and systematic solutions. Its products are used in automobile, shipping, aerospace, nuclear, military, and various otherindustries. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. Fujian Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Rugao, China.
General.Address: In Forging Ind. Park of Eco Dev Zn, Rugao, China, 226578
